text: Enyere m iwu ka e nyochaa chọpụta, e mere nyochaa, a chọpụtakwara ya nʼakwụkwọ na obodo a siterị nʼoge gara aga bụ obodo na-ebuli onwe ya megide ọtụtụ ndị eze,4:19 Ebe a na-arụtụ aka na nsogbu, na nnupu isi dịrịị nʼoge ọchịchị eze Hezekaya, Jehoiakim nakwa Zedekaya, megide ọchịchị ike nke ndị iro ha na-achị ha. 2Ez 18; 19; 2Ez 24:20; 2Ih 36:13. bụrụkwa ebe na-akpali nnupu isi na okwu na-eweta ọgbaaghara.
